name: Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airou Village DX
name_original: Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airou Village DX
description:
Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airou Village DX is an action-RPG game developed by Capcom Production Studio 1. It came out on 10-09-2015. It was published by Capcom.
You can play Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airou Village DX on Nintendo 3DS.
Yuji Takenouchi scored the game.
